title: nasus op
body: I just played a game and this was my build {{item:3110}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3053}} now wen I got {{item:3053}} my q went from doing 700 to 1k try it so op and fun

replies.body:
Nasus is probably the most OP champion in the game and always will be, this is not due to him being OP and any sense, he is actually quite weak at what he does, but you cannot deny his Q hits like a truck when you let him farm.

I have gone full AD Nasus and hit 2.5K non crit with each Q, but on the flip side I die instantly if I go against anyone with CC or multiple enemies. If I can catch them it is another story, 2-3 Q hits and most enemies are dead, and if you hit that squishy champion, all it takes is one Q.

Now let's look at why he is so OP and it is very simple, you counter build with nothing but defense and just stack your Q, if the enemy is bad enough you take the tri force for that extra oomph, with 5 defensive items you can't die, your ult means not only do you survive longer, but you hit harder again.
